StreamHub Java API

Introduction

See:
          Description

Packages
com.streamhub.api The main classes and interfaces of the Streaming API.
com.streamhub.nio The main classes for creating and starting the server.

 

Introduction

This document describes the Java API for creating, starting and registering listeners with the StreamHub Comet and HTTP Push server.

Examples and Tutorials

The latest tutorials, news and getting started guides are available on the StreamHub Comet Blog. Here is a list of some of the introductory guides:

  • Getting Started with StreamHub and Comet - A quick getting started guide which takes you through how to create a simple 'Hello World' Comet application using the StreamHub Java SDK for Streaming and the AJAX Client API.
  • Tutorial: Building a Comet Chat Application with StreamHub - A tutorial introducing publish functionality which takes you through how to create a basic Comet chat application.

More examples are available in the SDK available to download from the StreamHub website.

Support

Commercial customers should contact the StreamHub Support Team at support@stream-hub.com quoting their unique support key.

Community edition users can seek help in the StreamHub Comet Server Community on Google Groups.
